description: FirstCycling MCP Server - A comprehensive Model Context Protocol server that provides rich access to professional cycling data from FirstCycling. Enables analysis of rider performance, career progression, race results, historical cycling data, team information, and cycling competitions. Perfect for sports journalism, cycling education, rider analysis, and race research. Built with Python 3.10+ and uses web scraping to access FirstCycling data.

tools.name: get_rider_info
tools.description: Get basic biographical information about a professional cyclist including nationality, birthdate, weight, height, and current team affiliation.

tools.name: get_rider_best_results
tools.description: Retrieve a rider's best career results sorted by importance, highlighting their most significant achievements and victories.

tools.name: get_rider_grand_tour_results
tools.description: Get a rider's comprehensive results in Grand Tours (Tour de France, Giro d'Italia, Vuelta a España) throughout their career.

tools.name: get_rider_monument_results
tools.description: Retrieve a rider's results in cycling's Monument classics (Milan-San Remo, Tour of Flanders, Paris-Roubaix, Liège-Bastogne-Liège, Tour of Lombardy).

tools.name: get_rider_team_and_ranking
tools.description: Get a rider's complete team history and UCI ranking evolution over time, showing career progression and transfers.

tools.name: get_rider_race_history
tools.description: Retrieve a rider's complete race participation history with optional year filtering for detailed career analysis.

tools.name: get_rider_one_day_races
tools.description: Get a rider's results in one-day races with optional year filtering to analyze performance in classics and one-day events.

tools.name: get_rider_stage_races
tools.description: Get a rider's results in multi-day stage races with optional year filtering, covering Grand Tours, World Tour stage races, and other multi-stage events.

tools.name: get_rider_teams
tools.description: Retrieve the complete team history of a rider throughout their professional career, including all team transfers and contracts.

tools.name: get_rider_victories
tools.description: Get a comprehensive list of a rider's career victories with optional filters for WorldTour or UCI races to focus on specific competition levels.

tools.name: get_race_results
tools.description: Retrieve detailed results for a specific race edition by race ID and year, including final standings and stage-by-stage results.

tools.name: get_race_overview
tools.description: Get general information about a race including its history, records, past winners, and significance in professional cycling.

tools.name: get_race_stage_profiles
tools.description: Retrieve stage profiles and detailed information for multi-stage races, including elevation profiles and stage characteristics.

tools.name: get_race_startlist
tools.description: Get the startlist for a specific race edition with detailed or basic team information, showing participating riders and teams.

tools.name: get_race_victory_table
tools.description: Retrieve the all-time victory table for a race showing riders with the most wins and their historical dominance.

tools.name: get_race_year_by_year
tools.description: Get comprehensive year-by-year results for a race with optional classification filter to track historical winners and trends.

tools.name: get_race_youngest_oldest_winners
tools.description: Retrieve information about the youngest and oldest winners of a race for interesting historical context and records.

tools.name: get_race_stage_victories
tools.description: Get detailed information about stage victories in multi-stage races, including stage winners and sprint/mountain classifications.

tools.name: search_rider
tools.description: Search for professional cyclists by name, returning their IDs and basic information for further detailed queries.

tools.name: search_race
tools.description: Search for cycling races by name, returning their IDs and basic information to enable detailed race data retrieval.
